title: Idle Supermarket Tycoon
description: Idle Supermarket Tycoon is a casual clicker game where you manage a shopping mall, developing it by acquiring new shops and enhancing both the exterior and interior. Serve customers to earn money and reputation, then reinvest your profits to expand the mall. Assign priority customers to maximize profits and purchase delivery vehicles for additional income. Monitor the corridors for maintenance needs and complete missions for valuable rewards. Build your grand supermarket empire!
